name: ciscoasa.vim
description:
Cisco ASA - Adaptive Security Appliance

This syntax file will highlight the many common structures of the configuration. It helps to prevent some obvious mistakes and makes the result a lot more readable.

The syntax is far from complete, but many important parts have been implemented.
install_details: Put the "ciscoasa.vim" file in ~/.vim/syntax and you can use the command :set syn=ciscoasa in vim to enable.
